Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.YldB
      • com.xebisco.yield.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animator, AudioPlayer, SimpleRenderable, Transform, UXCanvas, YldScript
    public abstract class Component
extends YldB
    This class is a script for Entities, and is made to modify them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      The input variable of the scene of this Component.

      The selfTransform variable of this Component Entity.

        collisionNormal - The normal of the collision.

      • rayCast

        public RayCast rayCast​(Entity requestEntity,
                       Vector2 point1,
                       Vector2 point2)
        > This function returns a RayCast object that contains information about the first entity that was hit by a ray cast from point1 to point2
        Parameters:
        requestEntity - The entity that is requesting the raycast. This is used to determine if the raycast should hit the entity that is requesting it.
        point1 - The starting point of the ray.
        point2 - The end point of the ray.
        Returns:
        A RayCast object.

      • update

        public void update​(float delta)
        Called on every frame of the scene.
        Specified by:
        update in class YldB
        Parameters:
        delta - The time variation between the last frame and the actual one in seconds.

      • render

        public void render​(java.util.Set<Renderable> renderables)
        Called on every frame of the scene, after the update method.
        Parameters:
        renderables - A TreeSet of Renderable objects. This is a set of all the objects that need to be rendered.
